name: Hell's Inn
description:
Introduction

LBGT+ RPG oriented game. Play as George, a middle-aged man that decided to stay the night with his boyfriend and friends in an old inn in the middle of nowhere before continuing with your vacation trip.

Unfortunately, odd things occur at night between the walls of this place. Save your boyfriend and friends from the evil lurking through the rooms of this inn.

Controls

Use arrow keys to move. 

Press “Space” or “Enter” keys to interact with people and objects.

Press “Shift” key while pressing arrow keys to move.

Press “Esc” to open the menu.

You can also use a Gamepad to play.
